query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS ai_prediction_thresholds (
    id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    description TEXT,
    product_id INT,
    production_line_id INT,
    workstation_id INT,
    cpk_warning DECIMAL(5,3) NOT NULL DEFAULT 1.330,
    cpk_critical DECIMAL(5,3) NOT NULL DEFAULT 1.000,
    cpk_target DECIMAL(5,3) DEFAULT 1.670,
    oee_warning DECIMAL(5,2) NOT NULL DEFAULT 75.00,
    oee_critical DECIMAL(5,2) NOT NULL DEFAULT 60.00,
    oee_target DECIMAL(5,2) DEFAULT 85.00,
    trend_decline_warning DECIMAL(5,2) DEFAULT 5.00,
    trend_decline_critical DECIMAL(5,2) DEFAULT 10.00,
    email_alert_enabled INT NOT NULL DEFAULT 1,
    alert_emails TEXT,
    webhook_enabled INT NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
    webhook_url VARCHAR(500),
    priority INT NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
    is_active INT NOT NULL DEFAULT 1,
    created_by INT,
    created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
    updated_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
    INDEX idx_ai_pred_thresh_product (product_id),
    INDEX idx_ai_pred_thresh_line (production_line_id),
    INDEX idx_ai_pred_thresh_active (is_active)
)
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2bBfAdpTc8yvngq.root --database RpnsLdN3u3f6PBDr9mn7Zq --execute CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS ai_prediction_thresholds (
    id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    description TEXT,
    product_id INT,
    production_line_id INT,
    workstation_id INT,
    cpk_warning DECIMAL(5,3) NOT NULL DEFAULT 1.330,
    cpk_critical DECIMAL(5,3) NOT NULL DEFAULT 1.000,
    cpk_target DECIMAL(5,3) DEFAULT 1.670,
    oee_warning DECIMAL(5,2) NOT NULL DEFAULT 75.00,
    oee_critical DECIMAL(5,2) NOT NULL DEFAULT 60.00,
    oee_target DECIMAL(5,2) DEFAULT 85.00,
    trend_decline_warning DECIMAL(5,2) DEFAULT 5.00,
    trend_decline_critical DECIMAL(5,2) DEFAULT 10.00,
    email_alert_enabled INT NOT NULL DEFAULT 1,
    alert_emails TEXT,
    webhook_enabled INT NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
    webhook_url VARCHAR(500),
    priority INT NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
    is_active INT NOT NULL DEFAULT 1,
    created_by INT,
    created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
    updated_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
    INDEX idx_ai_pred_thresh_product (product_id),
    INDEX idx_ai_pred_thresh_line (production_line_id),
    INDEX idx_ai_pred_thresh_active (is_active)
)
